label: U(1) hypercharge -> Shadow handedness
reason: Requires Wolfram Alpha API, experimental data, or advanced computation not yet implemented
note: PENDING: U(1) hypercharge -> Shadow handedness. Validation: Only left-handed interact with W
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
shadow = reg.shadow_sector       # 125 - Shadow-A + Shadow-B
roots = reg.roots_total          # 288
chi = reg.chi_eff                # 144

# Weak hypercharge emerges from shadow sector handedness
# U(1) charge = shadow projection onto visible
Y_W_ratio = shadow / chi         # Hypercharge scaling
verified = abs(Y_W_ratio - (125/144)) < 0.001
